articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Choe Jun Gyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Choe Jun Gyong
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Friday sent a wreath to the bier of Choe Jun Gyong, a consulting writer of the State Merited Chorus who is winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and Labor Hero, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Exhibition of Achievements Made in Spirit of Self-Reliance and Self-Development
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Exhibition of Achievements Made in Spirit of Self-Reliance and Self-Development
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, visited an exhibition of achievements made by the youth shock brigade in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					 Members of the shock brigade invented and introduced effective building equipment and utensils and tools and made new sci-tech achievements with the might of self-reliance and self-development and thus greatly contributed to the building of a socialist power.
					
					 Going round the exhibition, Choe encouraged the shock brigade members creating the legendary tales about heroes in the era of Mallima at every worksite to effect a great upswing, and called on them to further accelerate the home production of equipment, utensils and tools.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Chief Meets Algerian Officials
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Chief Meets Algerian Officials
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK who is leading a delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, on a visit to Algeria, met with the secretaries general of the Ministry of Health, Ministry of Industry and Mines, Ministry of Youth and Sports, Ministry of Energy and the Ministry of Veterans on April 25 and 26 separately.
					 Present there were the members of the delegation and officials concerned of Algeria.
					
					 At the meetings Sin referred to the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the development of the bilateral relations and the rapid development made in all fields including economy and culture and in every sphere of social life thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's noble intention of respecting the people, and his ideas of giving priority to science and technology, the youth and sports.
					
					 He underlined the need to expand and develop the economic cooperation with Algeria in various fields.
					
					 Those secretaries general said that the bilateral friendly relations that were established in the period of the Algerian people's national liberation struggle are boosting under the deep care of Kim Jong Un and Bouteflika, president of Algeria, and expressed the intention to positively develop the bilateral ties through the mutual visits and exchange of experience in concert with the fine political relations between the two countries.

articles.title: S. Korean Group of Conservatives Censured for Persisting in Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
S. Korean Group of Conservatives Censured for Persisting in Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea in a statement Friday denounced the south Korean group of conservatives for groundlessly distorting the truth in the DPRK to tarnish and disgrace it, frustrated with their useless efforts for applying "effective sanctions".
					 The reptile media is orchestrating a farce under a scenario worked out by the conservative group, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Over the completion of Ryomyong Street and the auspicious event of moving into new flats, the pseudo-media put it that "houses are sold in secrecy even though they are said to be supplied free", "lifts may not operate properly due to electricity problem" and "ceremony of moving into deluxe flats is for propaganda".
					
					 They are making such sophism as "human rights situation" and "life of northerners" while misrepresenting the reality of the DPRK with photos and videos they cooked up in the 1990s when it was making Arduous March, in an attempt to find fault with it.
					
					 This is a hideous politically-motivated provocation and intolerable insult that touches off towering indignation and grudge of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the remnants of the conservatives keep making propaganda slandering and blaming the DPRK by egging the media, far from drawing a lesson from the total bankruptcy they have faced along with the impeachment of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 No matter how desperately the puppet group may try to turn white to black with all sorts of machinations and distortion, they can neither tarnish nor cover up the true picture of the DPRK, genuine society for the people and a great garden full of loving care for the people.
					
					 We warn the south Korean conservative media once again that they will be cursed by the nation as a group of traitors that hampered the improvement of the north-south ties and national reunification and a reptile media that sold off the conscience of mediapersons for a few pennies if they persist in their smear campaign against the DPRK to chime in with the group of conservatives, away from their mission to represent justice and truth and pioneer the times.

articles.title: Spanish Guest Returns
articles.content:
Spanish Guest Returns
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Jose Maria Vinals Camallonga, director for International Relations of the Lupicinio International Law Firm of Spain, returned home on Friday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean President
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, on April 12.
					 In the message Obiang Nguema Mbasogo extended heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 And he sincerely hoped that the Korean people would achieve great prosperity and the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further consolidate.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on April 13.
					 In the message Joseph Kabila Kabange extended, in the name of himself and all the people of DR Congo, the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, founder and eternal president of the DPRK.
					
					 He reaffirmed his will to make joint efforts with Kim Jong Un to further develop the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 He heartily wished Kim Jong Un bigger successes in leading the DPRK as well as good health.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from SG of Political Party of DR Congo
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from SG of Political Party of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, on April 14 received a reply to a message he sent to Henri Mova Sakanyi, secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and Democracy of DR Congo.
					 In the reply message, the secretary general extended thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending a congratulatory message on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of founding of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and Democracy of DR Congo, in the name of Joseph Kabila Kabange, founder of the Party and president of DR Congo and on his own behalf.
					
					 Wishing the Korean people more wonderful future, he reiterated the will of the Party to cooperate with the Workers' Party of Korea for the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Close
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Close
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- There closed Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team, the Defense Sports Team of the Korean People's Army and Korea University of Physical Education bettered national records in swimming, shooting and weightlifting events.
					
					 The male and female players of the April 25 Sports Team came first in the basketball event and male players of the Sobaeksu Sports Team and female players of the Pyongyang Sports Team finished first in the volleyball event.
					
					 The closing ceremony took place at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae and officials concerned, sportspersons and citizens.
					
					 Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, addressing the ceremony, appealed to all the players, coaches and officials to win more gold medals this significant year when the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners will be held.

articles.title: 13th National Machine Design Festival Opens
articles.content:
13th National Machine Design Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The 13th National Machine Design Festival opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Friday.
					 Designers, teachers, researchers, technicians and three-revolution team members of 110 odd units, including professional design institutions, educational and scientific research institutions, presented more than 580 designs and designing programs to the festival to be conducive to putting machine designing on a highly scientific and computerized basis.
					
					 A multi-dimensional designing competition and a prize design contest will be held during the festival.
					
					 Lectures on the current development of machine designing and technical exchange and service on latest design information and exhibits will also take place.

articles.title: Many Achievements Made in Forestation
articles.content:
Many Achievements Made in Forestation
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Tree nurseries across the DPRK have made great achievements in forestation of the country.
					 Most of city and county tree nurseries have produced millions or ten millions of saplings to the maximum on an average every year, thus increasing the nationwide sapling production by more than 1.6 times.
					
					 The sapling production is also put on a more scientific, industrial and intensive basis.
					
					 Every nursery has remodeled or built sapling greenhouses to be capable of automatically controlling interior environment and introduced valuable sci-tech achievements into sapling production.
					
					 Saplings are also cultivated on a mass scale.
					
					 In Thaechon County, North Phyongan Province, every family grows more than one hundred saplings. And the furniture factory in Huichon City produces tens of thousands of Larix lepolepis saplings in its nursery.
					
					 The forest science institutes and other relevant organs succeeded in home-production of plant nutriments to be conducive to turning the country into thick woodland and greenery at an early date.

articles.title: Unshakable Is Faith and Will of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Unshakable Is Faith and Will of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. brought an armada including the Carl Vinson nuclear aircraft carrier to the waters off the Korean peninsula in a bid to pressurize the DPRK by force of arms after revealing its wolfish nature, buoyed up by its military attack on Syria, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary.
					 Getting clearer is the true colors of the U.S. as a harasser of world peace and security and aggressor wantonly violating the sovereignty of other countries, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks that it has browbeaten the DPRK by firing dozens of cruise missiles at Syria. Such a thing can never menace the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. rash act will only boomerang on it.
					
					 The Obama group went so foolish as to work hard to stifle the DPRK through sanctions and pressure with the policy of "strategic patience." What his group sought to do all went belly-up.
					
					 Instead, his policy made the DPRK have access to everything necessary.
					
					 Far from drawing a lesson from it, Trump is recklessly resorting to the hackneyed methods, being utterly ignorant of the DPRK.
					
					 Unshakable is the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to build a socialist power by dint of their invincible single-minded unity, integral unity, self-reliance and self-development, and no force can check their advance.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Conservatives' Scheme to Come back to Power
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on S. Korean Conservatives' Scheme to Come back to Power
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Another "security crisis" campaign is being waged in south Korea with the "presidential" election just at hand, and it is the "Liberal Korea Party" and "Parun Party", the remnants of conservatism, that are playing the main role in the campaign, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Friday.
					 They seek to make the election favorable to them and gratify their ambition to come back to power by capitalizing on the issue of "security", the article points out, adding:
					
					 Such campaign is nothing but a farce of those philistines to attain the sinister political goal.
					
					 It is the trite way for the conservatives of south Korea to wage the campaign to rally their forces and condemn the progressive democratic forces as "forces causing insecurity" and "forces following the north" at every "presidential" election.
					
					 As for the "insecurity" in south Korea, it is the U.S. dangerous anti-DPRK nuclear war moves and the puppet conservatives' policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen that invited the "insecurity". It is, therefore, absurd that the group of traitors claim that "security crisis" was created due to "threat and provocation from the north".
					
					 The "crisis" is a product of the traitorous policy of the south Korean puppet conservative regime, which has closely cooperated with their American master in the reckless nuclear war moves against the DPRK.
					
					 No matter how desperately the traitors may try to mislead the public opinion through such smear campaign in a bid to come back to power, they can never escape their miserable fate.

articles.title: U.S. Administration's Strong-arm Policy Can Never Work on DPRK: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Administration's Strong-arm Policy Can Never Work on DPRK: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. test-launched a Minuteman-3 ICBM at an airbase in California at dawn of Wednesday, simulating a "strike on Pyongyang," amid the tensions running high on the Korean peninsula.
					 The test-fire, timed to coincide with the earlier-than-scheduled deployment of THAAD equipment and the arrival of the Carl Vinson nuclear aircraft carrier at the East Sea of Korea, makes the world see once again who is to blame for the deteriorating situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is just the U.S. which has pushed the situation on the peninsula to the brink of nuclear war by staging the largest-ever aggressive joint military drills against the DPRK for the past two months after bringing all sorts of nuclear strategic assets to south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK already filed complaints with the UN Security Council more than once against the U.S. hostile policy which compelled the DPRK to have access to nukes, and the nuclear threat and blackmail vividly manifested in the U.S.-led provocative and aggressive large-scale military drills targeting the DPRK.
					
					 However, the UNSC turned down every complaint but adopted a "resolution" prohibiting the DPRK from taking steps for self-defence without any ground in the light of international law. Worse still, it has neither taken issue with the U.S. over its nuclear threat to other country and missile attack on a non-nuclear state nor faulted its frequent ICBM test-launches.
					
					 It is, indeed, preposterous for the U.S. and its vassal forces to urge the DPRK to "cogitate" while condemning the step taken by the DPRK to bolster its nuclear deterrent for "self-defence" as a "threat" and sidestepping the root cause of the critical situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 No one in the world welcomes a gangster blackmailing the owner with a dagger.
					
					 It is an entirely legitimate right to self-defence for the DPRK to further increase its war deterrent to cope with the prevailing grave situation on the peninsula.
					
					 The present reality clearly proves that the DPRK was so right when it made a crucial decision to strengthen its nuclear force in quality and quantity under the uplifted banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK is a treasure sword of justice and reliable war deterrent to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and global peace from the nuclear war threat posed by the U.S.
					
					 In case a war breaks out on the peninsula, the U.S. will be held wholly accountable for it, no matter who made preemptive attack. It is because the U.S. has caused troubles by bringing a lot of nuclear strategic assets and special warfare means to strike the DPRK, not content with steady escalation of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Nonsensical and absurd is the policy of "maximum pressure and engagement" worked out by the Trump administration without any elementary sense about reality.
					
					 The Trump administration had better not forget the fact that the reason of the failure of all DPRK policies of its predecessors, notably the hard-line hostile policy, lie in their misjudgment of the DPRK, and that what they faced for the wrong policies were bitter defeats only.
					
					 The U.S. sustained the first defeat since its foundation for igniting a war in the 1950s, being ignorant of its opponent. It was made to sign a written apology for the first time in its history. They were all natural outcome of the DPRK-U.S. standoff.
					
					 How can one call the U.S. a normal country as it desperately persists in hostile policy toward the DPRK despite bitter defeats?
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. resorts to its moves hostile to the DPRK, the stronger the latter becomes. The U.S. ever-increasing military threat makes the latter's fortitude and retaliatory capability get stronger.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in playing chicken to test the will and perseverance of the DPRK, it will be made to actually experience what a real war is like.

articles.title: Immediate Withdrawal of THAAD from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Immediate Withdrawal of THAAD from S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea reportedly issued a statement Wednesday, urging the U.S. and the puppet authorities to immediately withdraw THAAD they had introduced all of a sudden, in deception of the people.
					 Even though they told the press that they would deploy THAAD after the "presidential election", the U.S. and the authorities stealthily introduced THAAD hardware, the statement charged.
					
					 It strongly denounced the U.S. for illegally bringing THAAD, demanding its immediate withdrawal.

articles.title: S. Korean Christians Protest THAAD Deployment, Escalation of Tension
articles.content:
S. Korean Christians Protest THAAD Deployment, Escalation of Tension
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches in a statement on April 26 censured the U.S. and the puppet military authorities for deploying THAAD, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 Noting that the U.S. brought THAAD hardware all of a sudden into Songju Golf Course, the statement branded it as an act of war against the people.
					
					 It urged "presidential" candidates to voice definite opposition to THAAD deployment and not to sidestep it.
					
					 Earlier on April 24, the organization held a joint press conference with the Christian organization in the U.S. and sent an urgent letter demanding a stop to THAAD deployment and the moves of escalating tension on the Korean peninsula to the U.S. president and the acting president of south Korea.
					
					 The urgent letter called for withdrawal of all the military steps fostering the south-north confrontation and immediate negotiations between the DPRK and the U.S. for conclusion of a peace accord and denuclearization of the peninsula.

articles.title: Korean Residents in China Warn U.S. Not to Run Amuck
articles.content:
Korean Residents in China Warn U.S. Not to Run Amuck
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China on April 25 made public a statement in which it urged the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers not to run wild, clearly mindful that the toughest counter-measures of the DPRK include new modes unprecedented in the world history of war.
					 The statement charged that the Trump administration has cried out for "preemptive strike" and other military actions against the DPRK over its legitimate measure for bolstering up the nuclear force.
					
					 What is all the more intolerable is that the south Korean puppet conservatives fanned up the American master's war frenzy, asserting that the Trump administration should not hesitate and it is necessary to mete out the indiscriminate punishment hard to endure, it said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK and its people value and love the peace very much, but they neither fear a war nor avoid it.
					
					 The DPRK declared that it would readily react to any war mode the U.S. wants. Time will prove that it is not an empty warning.
					
					 All the members of the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China will turn out in the struggle of justice to foil the anti-DPRK nuclear war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers.

articles.title: Young Koreans in China Vow to Stand up against U.S.
articles.content:
Young Koreans in China Vow to Stand up against U.S.
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China in a statement on Tuesday declared that young Koreans in China would turn out in the anti-U.S. struggle, together with the youths in the homeland.
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime should never be pardoned as they are making desperate efforts to impair the dignity of the DPRK and bring down its social system, trumpeting about "preemptive strike" despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The enemies are utterly ignorant of the youths of the DPRK and Paektu.
					
					 The DPRK is the only youth power of Mt Paektu in the world and the Korean youths are standing guard over the frontline to wipe out the enemies.
					
					 The enemies will meet deaths before realizing that there are in the world no youths like overseas young Koreans who love their homeland, hate the enemy and are resolved to devote their lives to the do-or-die battle against the enemy.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions on Day of Sun
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions on Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties and organizations and personages of different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions between March 29 and April 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among them were delegations of political parties and organizations of Cambodia, Mexico and Nigeria, the general coordinator of the International Department of the C.C., Communist Party of Cuba, the vice-minister of Higher Education who is chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the president of the Prensa Latina News Agency, bureau directors of the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba, a department director of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, the first vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, the department director of Iranian Army Protocol Affairs and Foreign Relations, the department director of International Relations of the Iranian Workers' House, the chairman of the Bangladeshi Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Sun, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, the international secretary of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, a former prime minister of Nepal, the general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the national chairman and the general secretary of the Brazilian Democratic Workers' Party, the general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, members of the leadership of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and the vice department director of Foreign Relations of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola.
					
					They laid floral baskets and bouquets at the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their pictures and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Praise KPA
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Praise KPA
 Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on April 18 issued a joint statement to mark the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Lauding the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk for founding and strengthening of the KPA, the statement said:
					
					 The KPA is a heroic army as it defeated the U.S., which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, for the first time in history under the distinguished leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the great brilliant commander of Paektu with iron will and superb strategy.
					
					 Under the care of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, it had developed into invincible ranks resolutely foiling the reckless aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists to strangle the DPRK.
					
					 Today the KPA has grown up to be the most powerful revolutionary armed forces possessed of even H-bomb.
					
					 Preemptive nuclear strike is no longer the monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear force feared by the U.S. imperialists and other war maniacs is the treasured sword of Songun for reliably protecting peace of the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The KPA, fully ready politically, ideologically and in military technique, is an army that the enemy fears most.
					
					 That's why no formidable enemy dare provoke the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Choe Jun Gyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Choe Jun Gyong
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 28 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Choe Jun Gyong, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung, Heroe del Trabajo y escritor-asesor del Coro Estatal Benemerito, en senal de profundas condolencias por su deceso.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre sede de exhibicion de exitos de brigadas de choque juvenil
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre sede de exhibicion de exitos de brigadas de choque juvenil
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, recorrio la sede de exhibicion de los resultados logrados por las brigadas de choque juvenil haciendo gala del espiritu de autofortalecimiento.
					Con el poderio del espiritu de autofortalecimiento, los brigadistas inventaron y aplicaron los equipos de construccion y las herramientas de alta eficiencia y lograron nuevos exitos cientifico-tecnicos, de manera que hicieron aporte a la construccion de potencia socialista. 
					
					En la ocasion, Choe estimulo a los brigadistas juveniles quienes registran los mitos heroicos de la epoca de Mallima en los campos de construccion y les exhorto a avivar mas las llamaradas de la produccion con los recursos nacionales.

articles.title: Jefe de la delegacion de MINREX se entrevista con funcionarios argelinos
articles.content:
Jefe de la delegacion de MINREX se entrevista con funcionarios argelinos
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- El vicecanciller coreano Sin Hong Chol, quien encabeza la delegacion del MINREX de la RPDC de visita en la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, se reunio los dias 25 y 26 por separado con los secretarios generales del Ministerio de Salud, el Ministerio de Industria y Mineria, el Ministerio de Juventud y Deportes, el Ministerio de Energia y el Ministerio de Veteranos.
					En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes los integrantes de la delegacion visitante, por la parte coreana, y por la argelina, los funcionarios de las ramas interesadas.
					
					El vicecanciller Sin se refirio a las hazanas de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il acumuladas por el desarrollo de las relaciones con Argelia y agrego que la RPDC esta logrando un desarrollo vertiginoso en todos los dominios de la economia, la cultura y la vida social materializando el noble proposito del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un de respetar al pueblo y su idea de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas, la juventud y el deporte.
					
					Manifesto la voluntad de ampliar y desarrollar la cooperacion economica con Argelina en diversos sectores.
					
					Los secretarios generales argelinos apuntaron que las relaciones de amistad entre dos paises, iniciadas ya en el periodo de la lucha de liberacion nacional del pueblo argelino, se desarrollan bajo la atencion de Su Excelencia Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y Su Excelencia Presidente Bouteflika.
					
					Expusieron la voluntad de desarrollar mas las relaciones bilaterales por conducto de viajes reciprocos e intercambio de experiencias, en correspondencia a los excelentes vinculos politicos.

articles.title: Portavoz de UPC denuncia propaganda intrigante anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de UPC denuncia propaganda intrigante anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- Ahora, la banda conservadora surcoreana, que hablaba tanto de la "eficiencia de la sancion", esta muy pasmada ante la realidad brillante de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y libran una desesperada campana de propaganda falsa a fin de manchar la imagen de la RPDC. 
					Los medios de prensa surcoreanos son venales que estan orquestando una farsa intrigante trazada por la banda conservador.
					
					Asi subraya el portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Periodistas de Corea en una declaracion publicada el dia 28 y continua:
					
					A fin de calumniar la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong y la alegria de los habitantes que se mudan a las nuevas viviendas, los pseudos medios de prensa surcoreanos dicen que "aunque dicen que el Norte de Corea ofrece a gratis las viviendas al pueblo, las venden y compran secretamente".
					
					Ademas, difunden unos rumores tales como "los elevadores no operaran bien por falta de electricidad" y "el acto de mudanza a nuevas viviendas lujosas deviene una propaganda".
					
					Para colmo, adjuntando las fotos y videos, fabricados e inventados por los titeres surcoreanos en la decada de 1990 cuando la RPDC pasaba la Marcha Penosa, tergiversaron como si esos datos reflejaran la situacion actual de la RPDC y anadieron que son la "situacion de derechos humanos del Norte de Corea" y la "vida de los habitantes norcoreanos".
					
					Esta provocacion politica excita y burla al maximo al ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Lo que no puede pasar por alto es que los remanentes de la banda conservadora, que se encuentran a punto de arruinarse por la dimision de Park Geun-hye, siguen haciendo a los medios de prensa calumniar y difamar la RPDC.
					
					Pero, sus desesperaciones pueriles nunca pueden denigrar  el verdadero aspecto de la RPDC, pais ideal del pueblo y gran jardin de amor al pueblo.
					
					Advertimos otra vez que si los medios de prensa conservadores del Sur de Corea siguen divulgando las propagandas intrigantes anti-RPDC, lejos de su mision de representar la justicia y veracidad y conducir la epoca, seran condenadas por toda la nacion como el colectivo de traidores que impidieron la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de la patria, y como los venales.

articles.title: ACNC comenta el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM contra la RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC comenta el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 28 de abril (ACNC) -- Cuando se agrava la tension en la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. realizo a la madrugada del 26 de abril en una base de fuerzas aereas del Estado de California el lanzamiento de ensayo de ICBM Minuteman-3 suponiendo el "ataque a Pyongyang".
					Este disparo, que coincide con el emplazamiento a modo de relampago de THAAD en el suelo surcoreano y la llegada del portaaviones nuclear Carl Vinson al Mar Este de Corea, hace a todo el mundo distinguir quien es el culpable de la actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a punto de guerra nuclear.
					
					Durante 2 meses pasados, el imperio introdujo en el Sur de Corea las propiedades estrategicas nucleares de todo tipo con que realizaron los ejercicios militares conjuntos de caracter agresivo y de mayor envergadura en la historia contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Ya la RPDC acuso en varias ocasiones al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU esas maniobras que constituyen la muestra mas coherente de la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU, factores que obligaron a la primera a preparar el arma nuclear.
					
					Sin embargo, el Consejo de Seguridad paso por alto todas las demandas de la RPDC y aprobo las "resoluciones" que prohiben, sin ningun fundamento de derecho internacional, las contramedidas autodefensivas de ella.
					
					De otro lado, nunca cuestiona a EE.UU. aunque este pais amenaza a otros paises con armas nucleares, ataca con misiles al pais desprovisto de estos artefactos y lanza periodicamente el ICBM a modo experimental.
					
					En vez de sentirse culpables por la delicada situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. y sus satelites califican de "amenaza" las medidas de la RPDC para el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo demandandole "actuar con seriedad". 
					
					No habria en este mundo el que de bienvenidas al bandido que chantajea al dueno con el punal en la mano.
					
					Fortalecer el disuasivo de guerra frente a la grave situacion dada en la Peninsula Coreana es el legitimo derecho a la autodefensa de la RPDC.
					
					La realidad de hoy comprueba otra vez cuan correcta fue la opcion de la RPDC de incrementar en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo las fuerzas armadas nucleares bajo la bandera de la linea de impulsar simultaneamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas de ese tipo.
					
					Ellas son el fidedigno disuasivo de guerra para defender desde las amenazas de guerra nuclear del imperio la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la paz mundial.
					
					 Si estalla la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, la responsabilidad recaera, sea quien fuera el autor de ataque preventivo, sobre EE.UU. que insatisfecho de haber endurecido constantemente la politica de hostilidad contra la RPDC, complico el problema introduciendo numerosas propiedades estrategicas nucleares y medios de operacion especial.
					
					Es muy absurda y aventurera la politica de "maxima presion e intervencion", inventada por la administracion Trump sin tener ni la elemental sensibilidad de la realidad.
					
					La administracion Trump debera recordar que las politicas sobre la RPDC de los sucesivos ejecutivos estadounidenses, incluso la de hostilidad e intransigencia, fueron fracasadas debido al mal entendimiento sobre el pais socialista.
					
					EE.UU. sufrio la primera derrota despues de su fundacion en la pasada guerra coreana y firmo la primera nota de disculpa de su historia porque habia juzgado mal a su rival.
					
					No se puede considerar como Estado normal a EE.UU. que se obstina en la politica hostil anti-RPDC a pesar de sus repetidas derrotas amargas.
					
					La RPDC se fortalecera aun mas cada vez que el imperio recrudezca la campana hostil y amenaza militar contra ella. 
					
					Si EE.UU. se atreve a sondear la voluntad y paciencia de la RPDC con sus actos fanfarroneados, probara lo que es la guerra de verdad.
